title: AI Chatbot for College Queries
description: Built an AI-powered chatbot using Python + NLP to answer student FAQs. Served via Flask web app for accessibility and ease of use. Trained on real student Q&A data to improve accuracy and response time.

title: Stock Price Prediction System
description: Created ML model using Scikit-learn, Pandas, NumPy for stock predictions. Implemented regression + data visualization with Matplotlib/Seaborn. Achieved 82% accuracy on test predictions.

title: Portfolio Website Development
description: Designed and deployed my personal portfolio using HTML, CSS, and JS. Showcased academic projects and achievements via responsive UI. Hosted on GitHub Pages with version control via Git.
